availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Henry Roberts Jr. (Caldwell co., ky, farmer )

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Nancy Roberts. Father of James H. Roberts Jr., Isabella Roberts, Mary A. Roberts, Lucinda Roberts, John Roberts, Elizabeth "Bettie" Roberts, and Paulina Roberts. Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Employed Benjamin F. Martin as a farm laborer in Caldwell County in 1850. Farmer in Princeton in 1860. Employed Noah Strong as a farmhand in Princeton in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, District 1, p. 284A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell County, Princeton, p. 91.
